title: debuni
author: debuni
created_time: October 24, 2023, 08:42:26 PMLast edit: October 25, 2023, 09:21:33 AM by debuni
content: Hello,I'd like to offer my services of professional programming. Boasting a Master's degree in Computer Science coupled with 3 years of rich experience in the tech world, I've been privileged to be part of various projects that span both traditional and cutting-edge technological domains.Being a crypto enthusiast since as soon as 2013, I have an extensive experience in the crypto world and think my expertise can be of value for new projects.üìå About Me: I hold a Master's degree in Computer Science.I bring 3 solid years of professional experience to the table.Having worked on numerous projects, I've cultivated diverse skills and expertise that cater to both traditional and emerging technology domains.üîç Services I Offer: - Web2 Development:Custom Web ApplicationsE-commerce WebsitesPersonal Blogs & PortfoliosDynamic Websites and Web Portals- Web3 & Blockchain:DApp DevelopmentSmart Contract Development in SolidityToken Creation & ICOsDecentralized Exchanges & DeFi Platforms- Software & Application Development: Custom Software DevelopmentDesktop ApplicationsMobile Appsüîß Languages & Technologies I Specialize In: Solidity: Smart contracts, Ethereum DApps, and DeFi.C++: System software, high-performance applications, and more.Python: Web apps, AI/ML, data science, scripting, etc.JavaScript (and frameworks): Front-end web development, Node.js, React, Vue, etc.Telegram: @debuni

comments.author: Vispilio
comments.body: Sounds good, any Ethereum / DeFi projects you've been involved with in the past which you can share ?we have a new token launch coming up, there might be an opportunity to collaborate, I'm also @Vispilio on telegram, let's talk more there.

comments.author: khiholangkang
comments.body: It seems that you show that you have a lot of experience in the world of programmers, but in my opinion it would be nice for you to show a portfolio of your work experience, or what projects you are involved in it or what projects you have finished, so that we are here to know that you are someone which is credible in this service business.I think it will also be an attraction for people who want to use your services.

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: Are people who want to develop applications but have limited resources and therefore wish to give equity in exchange for payment, are they part of your considerations?Loads of projects seems to want to startup but they have limited funding and therefore will appreciate to have on board, someone who will accept equity for inputs.
